More Features.

Lightning Fast

More than 1,000,000 TPS capacity with a final confirmation time of under 1 sec.

No Transaction Fees

Zero fee transactions, competency in micropayment and everyday payment scenarios.

Popular dApps

Over 1000+ popular dApps running on Mixin Network.

Developer Friendly

Make it easier for developers to use any language they want to quickly create products and services.
